title: Hide message IDs from chat UI while preserving share/anchor functionality

requirements.summary: Remove visible message ID display from chat bubbles while preserving DOM attributes for anchor scrolling and share functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Message IDs are no longer visibly rendered in the chat bubble UI for any message
The DOM element for each message still has an id or data attribute containing the message ID so anchor links work
Clicking the share button on a message still generates a correct share URL with the zero-padded 9-digit message ID
Opening a share URL still scrolls to and highlights the correct message
No other visual or functional changes are present in the chat UI

file_operations.description: Remove the visible text rendering of message.messageId from the JSX output. Ensure the message container element retains its id={message.messageId} attribute (or equivalent data-message-id attribute) so URL anchor scrolling and share link functionality continue to work. Do not modify any other rendering logic, styles, media embeds, reactions, pinning, or reply handling. Verify that the share button logic remains intact and continues to reference message.messageId correctly.
